2051270.name: The Legend of Mythos Demo
2051270.description:
Mythos, a mysterious traveler that lost his memories,

the only clue he has about himself is a "Feather" that seems to be contains a mysterious power.

Led by the legend of the feather told in some region, Mythos start to travel wherever he could find a clue about himself.

In the middle of his journey he come to Gensokyo, a land of mysticism of the east.
Here, he meet people that will guide him on his journey.

- 5 Heroines that will give you trials

- 20 sex scene and more with some harems

- 30 miniquests to clear

- and don't forget the cute girls

- pregnancy ending

The player must clear the mystery of people heart frozen over which is mentioned in this winter village myths to continue his journey.
